LanguageData.MSFS.Name: More Steel from Slag
LanguageData.MSFS.SteelAmount: Amount of Steel Obtained by Smelting Slag:
LanguageData.MSFS.SteelAmountTip: Vanilla value is 20. (Changes to this value will only take effect after the game is restarted.)
LanguageData.MSFS.WorkAmount: Amount of Work Required to Smelt Slag:
LanguageData.MSFS.WorkAmountTip: Vanilla value is 27. (Changes to this value will only take effect after the game is restarted.)
LanguageData.MSFS.Component: Smelting Slag Also Yields a Component.
